https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qDyPhJSsiEINKHPeSxrwVyo8gJk.jpg Based on a real life event, a young Chinese woman boards a bus with her boyfriend to head home to meet his parents. What was supposed to be a joyful holiday turns unpredictable when a pair of countryside crooks hijack their bus. Traveling through China's dangerous mountain passes, the passengers must decide how much they are willing to sacrifice for their own safety. August 15th
